title: White House says Trump 'won' dispute with porn star
text:
White House says Trump 'won' dispute with porn star 12:34am GMT - 02:13 
The White House on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit against the president by adult film star Stormy Daniels, claiming the case had gone to arbitration, which Donald Trump 'won.' But that statement may be an admission that Trump is party to an agreement where Daniels was paid hush money to keep silent about an alleged sexual affair. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
